title: Luxurious Apt w/laundry, Work-from-Home. Next to the Presidio
posting_body: ['Impeccably designed and spacious apartment between Pacific Heights and Presidio Heights.', '10ft ceilings, natural white Oak flooring, amazing chef’s kitchen, two ensuite bathrooms finished in marbles and stone.', ' Abundant  storage throughout the unit.', ' As a resident, you’ll live in a highly desirable location that’s a short walk to the best of Fillmore Street’s exclusive boutiques and fine restaurants.', 'Turn the corner and you are in the Presidio with all its trails, biking, and recreation.', ' A peaceful place to call home.', 'Amenities', '•\tKitchen: High-end Thermador Range with pot-filler faucet, stainless Dishwasher, Double French door refrigerator, Garbage Disposal, Microwave.', 'Carrara Quartz countertops, bar seating, counter-to-ceiling tile', '•\tLiving Room: Expansive, open-concept as living room opens up to an outdoor patio through over-sized sliding glass doors.', "10' ceilings with recessed lighting throughout.", 'Entry foyer and gallery hallway', '•\tLaundry:', 'In-unit', '•\tBedrooms: Two spacious bedrooms, both with large ensuite bathrooms and walk-in closets', '•\tBathrooms: Duravit sinks and toilets, floor to ceiling Carrara marble and tile, high-end fittings', '•\tClosets: Walk-in closets outfitted with Elfa shelving systems', '•\tStorage: Separate small room, outfitted with Elfa shelving systems perfect for additional storage', '•\tFlooring: 4" white oak plank natural flooring with an oil finish', '•\tExterior: Private garden patio', '•\tHeating/cooling: Central forced air heating system with Nest thermostat', '•\tWiring: Cable-ready', '•\tSecurity and Access: Controlled access', '•\tNo Pets', '•\tEqual Housing Opportunity', 'Walk Score & Nearby', '•\tWalk Score:\t\t96', '•\tTransit Score:\t        68', '•\tBike Score:\t\t71', '**Covid and Shelter In Place compliant in person apartment showings allowed.', 'Set up an appointment today.', '**', 'Contact Information:', '•\tApplication Fee: $45 per applicant (18+)', '•\tTo schedule a viewing of this gorgeous apartment, please call/text:', 'Patty Szeto  Please reference SAC02CL', '•\tProperty Manager:', 'Renee Engelen DRE Broker # 01879547', "Renter's Insurance required"]
